document.full_text: samsung electronics, the world's top maker of memory chips and flat screens, is likely to report a third consecutive quarterly drop in earnings for the january-march period, hit by tumbling prices of flat screens and tvs.
document.title: samsung's profit may disappoint but chip outlook positive
lines_and_colors: samsung electronics, the world's top maker of memory chips and flat screens, is likely to report a third consecutive quarterly drop in earnings for the january-march period, hit by tumbling prices of flat screens and tvs.
